Statement: DEL-05-05 implements scope item SOW-0504: Optional priced item for Town of Penhold signage and branding for main building exterior (code-required signage is base).
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Decomposition Scope Ledger: SOW-0504 maps to DEL-05-05_Optional-Branding-Signage under PKG-005.

Statement: DEL-05-05 supports OBJ-010: Provide transparent separable pricing for optional scope items.
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Decomposition Objectives Table: OBJ-010 covers SOW-0500 through SOW-0506.

Statement: DEL-05-05 traces to SOW-0229 (base signage scope boundary): code-required signage is base scope; branding signage is optional. The boundary between SOW-0229 and SOW-0504 defines the scope of this deliverable.
EvidenceQuote: Code-required signage (interior and exterior) must be included in base scope regardless of this option
Notes: FACT. SOW-0229 explicitly referenced in Datasheet Conditions and Specification Out of Scope as the complementary base-scope boundary item.

Statement: Main building exterior design and base signage design (SOW-0229) are required inputs: exterior concept informs sign locations; base signage scope (SOW-0229) defines the boundary between code-required and optional branding signage.
SourceRef: Procedure.md > Prerequisites > For Proposal Production (Phase A)
EvidenceQuote: Access to site plan and main building concept to determine available exterior sign locations
Notes: FACT. Procedure explicitly states main building concept is needed for sign locations. Also: "Understanding of code-required base signage scope (OSR 10.3.11; SOW-0229) to define the boundary accurately" -- SOW-0229 is implemented by DEL-02-01.

Statement: Facade geometry materials and mounting surfaces from envelope/structural design are required to finalize sign locations dimensions and confirm structural adequacy of sign mounting systems (REQ-05-05-09).
SourceRef: Procedure.md > Steps > Phase B > Step B3
EvidenceQuote: Confirm final exterior facade geometry materials mounting surfaces and available mounting locations
Notes: FACT. Procedure Step B3 explicitly requires coordination with architectural and structural teams for facade coordination and structural attachment requirements.

Statement: If illuminated signage is proposed electrical coordination is required: power supply location voltage wiring routing and controls. Conditional on illumination scope decision (TBD-02).
SourceRef: Procedure.md > Steps > Phase B > Step B3
EvidenceQuote: coordinate electrical requirements with the electrical team: Power supply location and voltage requirements
Notes: ASSUMPTION. Conditional dependency: applies only if illuminated signage is proposed. Illumination scope is TBD (Guidance TBD-02). Procedure Step B3.3 explicitly states coordination requirements, but only "if illuminated signage is proposed."

Statement: Town of Penhold branding/identity guidelines (logo files colour palette typography standards approved sign families) are a required input for branding signage design. Not provided in RFP; must be requested from Owner/Town.
SourceRef: Procedure.md > Prerequisites > For Proposal Production (Phase A)
EvidenceQuote: Town of Penhold branding/identity guidelines -- TBD: request from Owner via RFP 2.8 contact
Notes: FACT. Explicitly identified as TBD in Procedure Prerequisites, Specification REQ-05-05-08, and Guidance P3/C3. Branding guidelines are not in the RFP. SatisfactionStatus=PENDING because the input has not been received.
